DOC.brief_summary: CLBQ707A1101 assess tolerability , safety , efficacy pharmacokinetics gimatecan Japanese patient .
DOC.brief_title: An Extension Trial Phase I Dose Escalation Study Gimatecan Administered Orally 5 Consecutive Days Japanese Patients With Advanced Solid Tumor
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients complete core protocol ( CLBQ707A1101 , NCT00410358 ) exhibit stable disease , partial complete response define core protocol . If patient nonmeasurable lesion , he/she must exhibit progressive disease Exclusion criterion : Documented progressive disease define core protocol Patients performance status 3 4 ECOG scale Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
